personality: methodical, detail-oriented, confident, hands-on, and passionate about craftsmanship
message: I’m proud to be part of the transformation of this space. Every tool, every measurement, and every decision matters. I love the process of turning raw potential into something beautiful and functional. Whether it’s a new wall, a fresh coat of paint, or a reimagined layout, I take pride in doing it right. This isn’t just construction—it’s creation. And I’m excited to see the final result. Safety first, always. Let’s build something great.
cn_prompt: 画面中的男士一边对着镜头讲话一边往前走，镜头随着人物的走动慢慢往后退，保持人物在画面中。他头戴白色安全帽，手持一个黑黄相间的工具箱，身后是正在装修的房间，旁边放着梯子和水平尺。
en_prompt: The man in the image is walking forward while speaking to the camera. The camera slowly pulls back, keeping him centered in the frame. He is wearing a white hard hat and carrying a black-and-yellow toolbox. Behind him is a room under renovation, with a ladder and a level placed nearby.
